description: go-playground: fix for FireFox, remove traces of codemirror, disable spellcheck

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go-playground

Just one extra living alone. https://codereview.appspot.com/6506113/diff/1/goplay/edit.html File goplay/edit.html (right): https://codereview.appspot.com/6506113/diff/1/goplay/edit.html#newcode34 goplay/edit.html:34: There's no
matching this
.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go-playground/source/detail?r=781fa4f5d565 ***

go-playground: fix for FireFox, remove traces of codemirror, disable spellcheck

R=golang-dev, franciscossouza, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6506113

LGTM

Is there a 'fixes issue' for the firefox thing?

On 14 September 2012 08:59, Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org> wrote:
> LGTM
>
> Is there a 'fixes issue' for the firefox thing?

Nope. Just mailing list posts.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, franciscossouza@gmail.com, rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

On 2012/09/13 23:11:24, adg wrote:
> Hello mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com, mailto:franciscossouza@gmail.com, mailto:rsc@golang.org
> (cc: mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
> 
> Please take another look.

LGTM
